about_the_game:
Ahoy, mateys! Get ready for a high-stakes treasure hunt like no other in Treasure Hunt, a fast-paced party game where the only thing more valuable than the loot is the betrayal from your fellow pirates! Play as a pirate with a heart of steel, and race to dig up treasure chests hidden across the island. But beware—everyone’s after the same prize, and the only way to secure your bounty is to steal it right from your rivals' hands!

In Treasure Hunt, you’ll need to outsmart, outdig, and outfight your opponents to claim victory. With up to 6 players, frantic treasure hunts, and chaotic action, every round is a battle of wits and reflexes. Use your cunning to dig up treasure, roll away from danger, or take aim to steal loot from others. Will you be the pirate king, or will you walk the plank?

Key Features:

  • Fast-Paced Party Gameplay: Up to 6 players can join the treasure hunt in this frantic race for riches.

  • Treasure Digging & Loot Stealing: Dig up hidden chests, but watch out for other pirates ready to steal your haul!

  • Chaotic Combat: Roll to avoid attacks, shoot to defend your treasure, and take your rivals down a peg.

  • Easy-to-Learn Controls: Simple controls (WASD for movement, E to dig, Space to roll, Left Click to shoot) make it accessible to everyone.

  • Fun for All: Whether you're playing with friends or strangers, Treasure Hunt is the perfect party game to bring laughter and chaos to your next game night!

Set sail, find treasure, and steal your way to victory in Treasure Hunt. The loot awaits!
